product_overview: BeLink is a Web3 Quest Platform designed to facilitate community engagement via gamified quests, enabling projects to create interactive quests and users to discover projects, complete quests, and earn rewards and XP using a secure, multi-authentication system.
core_goals: Enable projects to create and manage quests with multiple task types to engage their communities.
Provide users with a seamless way to authenticate via wallets, email, or social OAuth, and participate in quests.
Implement real-time verification of social tasks across Twitter/X, Discord, and Telegram for authentic engagement.
Offer an XP and leaderboard system to incentivize user participation and showcase top performers.
Deliver a responsive, accessible, and unified UI/UX across devices.
Ensure robust security with encrypted data, RLS policies, and secure OAuth flows.
Support user profile and dashboard management for tracking progress and account linking.
Maintain privacy and compliance with GDPR and clear policy documentation.
key_features: Project & Quest Management with multi-step quest creation and varied task types including social, download, form, visit, and learn/quiz.
Authentication via wallet (EVM/Solana), email, and OAuth using Twitter/X, Discord, and Telegram.
Dynamic XP accumulation based on quest completion with global and quest-specific leaderboards.
Automatic real-time social verification using APIs from X/Twitter, Discord, and Telegram to validate tasks like follow, join, like, retweet, and subscribe.
Mobile-first and accessible UI design utilizing Tailwind CSS, Shadcn UI, and Radix UI components.
User Dashboard for tracking active and completed quests, badges, and achievements.
Profile management features allowing users to edit details, link/unlink social accounts, and manage wallet/email connections.
Robust testing using Jest and React Testing Library and validation with Zod schemas.
Secure backend integration with Supabase handling authentication, database, and storage with RLS.
Comprehensive privacy and security measures including encrypted tokens and secure OAuth flows.
user_flow_summary: User registers or logs in via wallet, email, or social OAuth.
User browses or searches for projects on the platform.
User joins a project and views available quests associated with it.
User completes multi-step quests involving tasks like social engagement verified in real-time via API checks.
User earns XP points upon quest completion and views rank in global or quest-specific leaderboards.
User accesses dashboard to track quest progress, badges, and achievements.
User manages profile settings including linking/unlinking social accounts and editing information.
Project owners register projects, create quests, add tasks, and review quest completion and leaderboard stats.
validation_criteria: All authentication methods (wallet, email, OAuth) function securely and reliably without unauthorized access.
Quest and task creation supports all defined task types and multi-step configurations as specified.
Real-time social verification correctly validates social task completion using respective platform APIs.
XP awards and leaderboard standings update accurately in real-time after quest completions.
UI responsiveness and accessibility meet mobile-first and accessibility standards across browsers.
User dashboard and profile management functionalities work flawlessly with data syncing correctly.
Unit and integration tests cover key components with successful test execution.
Security measures including encrypted tokens and RLS policies are enforced and tested.
Privacy policy and terms are integrated and accessible within the platform.
API endpoints for authentication, project, quest, and verification logic respond correctly and securely.
